name: Crystal Parker
text: When you come to get your car serviced, ask for Devon or Jeremy. They were the friendliest and most helpful when I brought my vehicle to be serviced. I had just bought my vehicle and had many questions. They were knowledgeable and incredibly patient when they answered them.

resp.text: Crystal, thank you for the kind words. We love hearing that our customers are happy with their experience at Bentley Cadillac! We appreciate your business and value you as a customer.

name: Valerie Stafford
text: I love Devon in the service department. She is focused on making sure the customer is greatly taken care of.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Valerie!  Please don’t hesitate to let us know when we can help in the future.  We value your business!

name: Damien Williams
text:
Checked my dash cam and the almost 4 hours I was at the dealership explained everything I needed to know. Car didn't get worked on until 2 hours into my wait. Had to wait 20 minutes after requesting an update after a couple hours of waiting. Not even a sorry for the wait or a discount.

Update: Talked to Alex over the phone and his apology seemed genuine and sincere. He went above and beyond to make it right.

resp.text: Very sorry for your experience. Your wait time was much longer than anticipated, so we are refunding you the alignment charges. We appreciate your business very much!

name: Austin Park
text: Aggressive pricing! One day I'll be able to afford a Cadillac, but I've consistently heard positive testimonies about them from people I've met who have bought a Cadillac there.

resp.text: Hello, we set high expectations for ourselves so it’s gratifying to hear you had a great experience with us. We do hope we can be of assistance in the future. Take care!

name: Susanne Pugh
text: I'm a transplant from Florida, so finding a Cadillac dealership in The Shoals area, with excellent service, is very important to me. Well I found that in Bentley Cadillac! My service advisor, Russell, was kind, courteous and very knowledgeable on the type of service my CTS would need, and making friends was an added bonus. Thank you!

resp.text: Thanks! We always want to hear back from our clients and we're glad you had such a positive experience with us! If you have any further questions, please give us a call. We're always happy to help!

name: Doris Vandiver
text: I am always pleased the way I am treated in the service department. Everyone is friendly and speaks in a kind voice. Devon is busy but is generally interested in me and how I am doing. I love how she takes care of me and my Cadillac. This service department is one of the best. Thanks for the team work!

resp.text: Doris, thank you for the review and the kind words. We will pass your praise along to Devon. We value your business.

name: Doris Garner
text:
Always Great Service!
Cecil takes such good care of us!
Thank you!

resp.text: We're glad everything was completed quickly and to your satisfaction! Feel free to reach out to us if you need anything. Have a wonderful day.

name: Monday nights
text: Russell made me feel at home very and highly satisfied

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!  Please don’t hesitate to let us know when we can help in the future.  We value your business!

text: Bobby warden was extreamly helpful form start to finish, I came in and he sat down with me and ordered the vehicle exactly how I wanted it. Kept me informed the whole time it was being built and when it arrived set up a delivery time for me to pick it up. He went over everything at the delivery and made sure I was comfortable with all the features before I left. Overall exceptional expierence with Bobby and the entire Bentley Cadillac dealership.

resp.text: Hi, your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us. Until the next time we meet, take care!

name: Willodean Davis
text: Great, Great Great .in everything they do.  Randy Gray and Devon Cox was wonderful helping me on such a bad day..Thank everyone at Bentley.

resp.text: Hi Willodean! We're glad to hear we were able to make your day a better one. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.

name: Jack McGowan
text:
Professional atmosphere
Courtesy was awesome
Service absolutely spot on
Cost was not out of line with competition

resp.text: Hi there, thank you so much for your positive comments about Bentley Cadillac of Florence! We sincerely thank you for the positive review, and look forward to seeing you again soon!

text: I understand up selling, but i felt like i was being pushed to buy services i did not want. Normally i deal with Devon but she was not there at this service.

text:
I took my Cadillac SRX in for a repair. Once again, Cecil Staggs was amazing.  He kept me posted on the progress of my car and was very helpful in getting it repaired in a timely manner    I appreciate the wonderful service I always get at Bentley Cadillac

Judith Rickard

Ms. Rickard,
Thank you for the review, and for your business. We will make sure Cecil hears about your praise, and we look forward to serving you in the years to come. Be well!

All done while we waited for a very resonable wait time.

She's the "Best" along with their group of service technicians and service manager, Mike.  A special thanks to Cecil Staggs who always does a great job in Serivce and Chris Staggs, General Manager.  Great group of people!

name: Freida Eubank
text: Bentley service took care to replace radio/HVAC touch screen and even washed & vacuumed my car.  Cecil Staggs & Devon Cox took care of my car.

resp.text: Freida,  Thank you for the review.  We'll try to give you a 5-star experience next time!

name: Cecil Staggs
text: I would never even think of purchasing or having my service done anywhere else!

resp.text: Hi Cecil. Congratulations on your purchase. Have a great weekend!

name: Deirdre King
text: Very pleased.

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you Deirdre.

name: Patricia Seymour
text: Love Gulf Coast Auto Group staff.  It’s the Audi that’s the problem.  I only have approximately 46K miles on the car.  She’s pretty.  But the convertible top has leaked since the purchase.  Then there have been so many problems with other parts, and a 3x AC problem/fix (qualifying it as a lemon), that it has been in the shop as much as it’s been with me.  I have a color-coded chart. When I let the “powers that be” at Audi know about the first few years of problems, they basically said, “FU with a smile”.  This car was actually built in Germany.  My German friends would be appalled.  They take their car quality very seriously.

name: Emily
text: I had a great experience purchasing my new car from Gulf Coast Auto Group. I highly recommend Mr. Kenny Cunningham. He was professional, honest, friendly, and made my buying experience easy and fast. All of the staff I spoke with were friendly and professional. I will use them in the future.

name: Ellie M
text: My service representative, Laura Collier, is wonderful! She always ensures that every issue is resolved. We have been extremely satisfied with the service that she and the mechanics at Audi of Mobile have provided to us over the past 5 years with our two Audis. My son took his Audi to another local repair shop and they caused damage to the vehicle because they lacked the knowledge and skills to properly perform the repairs. We then took his car to Audi of Mobile and they corrected everything! I will ONLY have my Audi Q5 serviced at Audi of Mobile.

name: Makenzie Brenner
text: I admit I was nervous to purchase a car online from a dealership over 6 hours away, but Gulf Coast Auto, specifically Devon made the experience seamless. Great communication, fantastic customer service and product knowledge. It was honestly the best experience I could’ve hoped for. 100% worth the road trip down and I am obsessed with my new car!

name: Queen Royalty
text: Everyone there is so nice and helpful. The finance department and the sales person (Alfredo Montes) made sure we understood the offer for our Volkswagen Atlas.

name: Myra C.
text: I went to Porsche of New Orleans and they were trying to blantantly make the 2018 Macan I wanted inaccessible. These fools really tried to make me put down 20,000 for a 500/month car payment. AVOID THAT DEALERSHIP AT ALL COST. They did not want to sell to a African American woman. Anyways, I found 2 more 2018 Macans in the Mobile area the same evening so we decided to go the next day. BEST DECISION EVER! I traded in my 2014 Infiniti Q60S that I loved dearly for a 2018 Porsche Macan! As a traveling CVOR tech, I needed more space and Kendarrius ensured that I didn’t leave without the vehicle that I wanted! I literally pulled up at 12:15 and was driving off at 4:30!! That was crazy fast, but if you are looking for an amazing deal on a beautiful car, THIS is the place to go. My monthly payment is 585/month on a PORSCHE!! That’s unheard of! They knew I wanted the car and this dealership made sure I left in it without having to eat bread and water for the next couple of years!

name: Monica Mingo
text:
My last two vehicles were Land Rovers.  I narrowed this purchase to an Audi or a Land Rover.  Devon took me on my test drives after donning a mask and I left with total knowledge of the Q5.  I went to the Land Rover dealership and was left knowing the same about their vehicles as I already knew upon arrival.  I was also unhappy with the attitude once I requested the salesman wear a mask during the test drive.

I called Devon the next morning to let him know that my husband and I would be returning and, when we got there, Devon was ready to go.  This young man has received several awards and accolades based on his performance and knowledge of Audi vehicles. I noticed two certifications on his desk.

Headed there my husband told me we were not going to buy the vehicle today and that this was simply an exploratory mission and that he wanted to test drive and then get the information in order to make a thoughtful decision.  After speaking with Devon at length, we ended up buying the Q5 same day.

Devon simply makes you feel good.  You sense his honesty right up front and there were no questions he couldn't answer.  We truly felt we were in extremely competant hands.

Thank you to Devon, the auto group, and for making it easy to jump the Land Rover ship and become a member of the Audi family.

name: Keri Van Atta
text: Alfredo Montes was very helpful and nice. We ended up not being able to afford the car we wanted, but he never made us feel bad or embarrassed. And most importantly he didn't make us feel like we wasted his time. He went above and beyond for us and I really appreciate it! Thanks Alfredo!!😊😊😊

name: Lee Lee
text: Courtney was so accommodating & super nice. Thanks Courtney- appreciate!

name: Daniel Flores
text: Purchased a VW all over the phone with Doug Klezmer. Doug took great care of me with a very smooth and convenient purchase. Very happy all the way around. Wish all car purchases were this easy! Thanks, Doug!

name: Michele
text: Me and my husband have had so many bad experiences here before the name change and new management or whatever. We always made appointments and would be there for 3 or 4 hours, we hated going there and the customer service was horrible! Today was the first time we've been there in at least a year or more and we were amazed at how much more better it is now. Our appointment was at 1 and we were out in less than an hour. Sean took great care of us and kept updated about what was going on with our car! The customer service was AMAZING! We have never experienced such great service like we did today. Thank you so much Laura and Sean and everyone for such a great experience and service we received today from you all!

name: Wayne Douglas
text: This dealership is very deceptive and dishonest. My salesperson was Alfredo. I specifically asked them to run my credit only through VW and stated that on the credit application. I found out a few days later that they had run it through all 3 credit bureaus instead and when I confronted Alfredo about it he said that that is just the way they do business and that my credit won't be hurt if I buy a car from them. My credit score dropped 24 points because of their unethical sales tactics. Most car manufacturers have their on inhouse financial arm so when you run your credit directly through them you only take an 8 point hit so that's why I made the specific request. Because I value my credit score so much it is very high and now I am reluctant to have it run at another dealership to get the car I want because of Alfredo and his companies dishonesty. This is just the worst fo many misleading statements Alfredo made to me. You're better off driving to one of the surrounding cities to buy your next vehicle than from here.

name: Krista Blanton-Goguen
text:
We recently bought our first Volvo. AJ has gone out of his way to make this experience as seamless as possible. His knowledge about the car far surpasses any other dealership we have worked with.
The vehicle is amazing and capable of so many things.  Each time the technology out smarts me he is always available to answer my text or phone call and walk me through it.
I just appreciate the extra effort he always goes to to make us feel valuable. I love my Volvo and don’t plan on going anywhere else for my future vehicles.

name: Robert Sanders
text: Had a wonderful experience from my first contact to walking out the door. Zach was great and took care of my wife and I. Recommended this place to everyone since buying a car and will go back for our next vehicle.

name: Patrick Isbell
text: My wife recently purchased a used 16 Beatle convertible that was a recent lease turn in. Devon was an awesome salesman and made us feel like family during the entire experience. I believe we got a quality vehicle and a reasonable price. I know she will be thinking of her buying experience and the welcoming employees whenever she drops the top this summer!

name: Edward Thomas
text: Gulf Coast Auto Group should change their name again, because of one simple question- do you give military discounts? No one in the service department knew or was unwilling to give at least 10% off. The parts department gave 10% off for military when I purchased 4 spark plug not less than 15 minutes laters. Military service people active and retired I will inform you don't buy anything from there without a discount 10% or higher, & at this point it should be higher.

name: june newton
text:
THIS THE PLACE!!
Considering a new car, this is the place! My husband and I bought 12 cars in our lifetime - this experience was by far the most professional/personable buying experience. The consultant, Santwan, was knowledgeable beyond measure, unlike the run-of-the-mil hunting salesman. The entire experience, from consultant, to floor manager [John], to Finance [Danny], to the GM [Mark].  Wow, treatment like the customer is a REAL PERSON not just a customer buying one of their cars - really, they have hearts and personality? We couldn't believe the care and the detail in service.  You go Gulf Coast Auto Group!!

resp.text:
Hi Ms. Newton, thank you so much for the kind words! We are thrilled that Santwan, John, Danny and Marc are an integral part of our team. We are so humbled that you chose Gulf Coast Auto Group!

Ashley Allen
Business Development Director

name: Elizabeth Millette
text: I recommmed this dealership to anyone. They made the car buying process easy! We first contacted Melissa from their online sales department. She was always quick to respond and answer our questions about a specific car, but never pushy or bothersome. When we were ready, she set us up an appointment to come in to the dealership. From that point we worked with Brittany Smith! She was a pleasure to do business with. Brittany was very friendly, knowledgeable and never made us feel rushed or pressured. We couldn’t be happier with our new car and the service we received at Gulf Coast Auto Group.

resp.text:
Hi Elizabeth, we are so happy you’re loving your new vehicle! Brittany and Melissa are key members to our sales team, and we are lucky to have them! I’ll pass your kind words on to them and our management staff Monday morning! Thanks again for giving us the opportunity to earn your business and we look forward to serving you!

Ashley D. Allen
Business Development Director

name: Chris Mayfield
text: These guys were amazing. They knew I wanted the car, and got the price and interest down to what I could afford. I would highly recommend this dealer.

resp.text: Thank you Chris! We appreciate your business and congrats on your new car!

name: Christian
text: I had an awesome experience with Gulf Coast Auto Group, after 7 months of searching for the right car and having poor experiences with other dealers across the nation as I live in Colorado, I was thrilled with my experience here. Santwan Wiley is the MAN. If you guys are looking for an excellent client advisor who will do everything in your best interest in helping you get into an awesome vehicle, he is your guy. I appreciate all the effort the team put in and his effort in to making sure that car was mine. I did not feel pressured at all and this was by the far the bestcar buying experience that I have had. I Cannot wait to get down there and take receipt of my new 2015 BMW X5! Thanks guys for an awesome experience!!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Christian.

name: Carly Martinez
text: thanks to mr devon for helping me buy my first car!

name: Becky Dunn
text: The is the best car dealer i have ever dealt with and mr. Paul Stanley is the best to deal with!! He will treat you right i love my Volkswagen !!!

name: Anthony Cook
text:
I leased a 2018 Volkswagen Jetta from this dealership on June the 27th. It is now August  6th and I have yet to get my tag paperwork. I had to call the bank to get my old car loan extended so my old car loan would not go in collections. Not only that shortly after I leased I noticed a small ding on my hood. I went to the dealership to see what they could do and they said it would be no problem to fix. It has now been over a month I haven't received a call or a text. I know the dealership has recently changed owners, but the management at this establishment really dropped the ball. My family will no longer purchase or lease any vehicles from this dealership.

I did try to call you. I left a message and no response. Why would I have expected anything different.

resp.text: Anthony- I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience. We expect exceptional customer service, and we regret that we missed that mark. My name is Ashley Allen and I am the Business Development Director here at Gulf Coast Auto Group. Please call me directly at 251.301.0013 so we can get you what you need asap.

name: Michael Kolbe
text: Thanks Devon! Great experience and a perfect vehicle!

name: Lisa Wurst
text: Stated that they did not have to follow through with what was written on my leasing contract “Since Dean sold it to us.”

name: Josh Bryan
text: I have rented from this hidden gem multiple times in the last 3 years. We have had a great experience every time. The prices are super competitive with your big chain rentals but the personalized service from the rental department is head and shoulders above anybody else in town. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you so much Josh! We are grateful for your business!

name: Zack Pridgen
text: They got me a car last minute, at an affordable rate, to boot. Will recommend to everyone in need of a rental car.

name: K. Turner
text: I bought a 2014 Ford Explorer it was a good price but I found out why real fast it has the seats that flip & @ first look it was so "clean" we didn't even think to look under the 3rd row seats & when i did HANDFULLS OF THICK DOG HAIR & the 3rd row seat belt was chewed up went back 3 or 4 times they Promised it would be spick & span I have picture proof it looked almost the same when I got it back.... I spent all day cleaning & I still find hair sometimes 😭.... & its definitely not from me (they tried to imply it wasn't like this when I bought it i only had it 2 or 3 days when i took it back) if someone wants a dog in there vehicle ok but me personally a dog doesn't get in my vehicle. And not even an offer to trade for something else or let us turn it in & go somewhere else. I had friends interested in 1 of there vehicles & I told them I wouldn't recommend that lot to an enemy.

name: Lee Fish
text:
👎👎Very displeased with this place! Sold me a POS with with a bad transmission!
TRUST ME!!!! You want to shop elsewhere!!! Their sales managers kolby and Mike are very unprofessional as well!!!

name: Alec Hadley
text:
On September 10, 2020, my car broke down right outside Chatom AL. I sent my car that was under warranty to Chatom Ford. That was one of my worst mistakes possible. The first week of their service was promising. After that it was all down hill. Shade the “Service Manager” was my main point of contact. He would promise me updates and call backs which I would never get a returning call. On October 16th I was PROMISED my car was repaired and ready for pick up. As I had two friends take off work to take me 5.5 hours to Chatom Ford, Shade called me and said “the car jumped time and is not ready”. The following day I called to get the new date  I could expect my car to be repaired.  Shade then tells me that he had been lying to me and my car was not ready and he does not know why my car is not fixed nor when it could be fixed. During this call he also promised me that the car would be sent to my house in Tennessee. After Shade continued to lie about my car and repairing it, I then moved to speaking with Collin Ward (General Manager)-  I only spoke with him once because he told me “ I’m sure what you are saying MAY have happened, but im sure my team has a better way of going about this story”. He also promised I would get a call back from him and I never did. Collin also asked me why I would even send my car here with it being out of state and not send it local (I was on my way back from vacation on the coast when it happened). In my opinion, this should not matter. With no hope, I called asking for the owner, Gene Brown. No one would help me reach him. Then I finally received a call from Kevin O’Brien. He was very promising and reassuring at first as they all were. Kevin worked with my father and I for about two weeks then he stated to not take our calls or call us back as promised. Last, my father began to work with Lara. She was helpful in helping us know what was going on. She is who we worked with for the rest of this mayhem. 99 days later on December 18th Chatom Ford met me in Mississippi to give me my car. This dealership is an ACTUAL JOKE. From day one I asked for nothing but updates and I never once got that. NOT ONE WORKER AT THIS PLACE (I say place because I can not call this a business because this place has no business structure at all.) was truthful in customer service to my father or myself. If anyone at this place has any further questions feel free to contact me as you have my name and number. PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY AND TIME BY NOT SENDING YOUR CAR HERE. THIS MANAGEMENT IS A JOKE AND ABSOLUTELY WORTHLESS IN THEIR PROFESSION.
Thank you for the worst Ford experience I could ever ask for. You really make a name for yourself.

name: Jesse Pike
text: Bought a 2019 Fusion Hybrid on Friday October 23 and I love it Anthony Palmer was  great getting me pre-approved and a awesome deal that fit my budget. I'll definitely be returning to Chatom Ford when I'm ready to make my next vehicle purchase

name: Kim K
text: More business need to be making a  difference like they do!  Thank you for living what you believe and doing what's right!  God-Guns- Freedom :0)

name: Missy Dunlap
text: Mr Joey in the service department went above and beyond to help me. I had several recalls and he took care of everything.

name: GetinTheTube1921
text: Mr. Anthony Palmer was one of the most helpful salesman at any dealership I have ever been to. This dealership is so genuine, and was extremely helpful. They gave me a great deal on a practically brand new car, and I am extremely satisfied with Mr. Palmer’s service. I would definitely drive the 600+ miles again when it is time to buy a new car. This was a wonderful experience and I would fully recommend this dealership to anyone.

name: Christine Jungblom
text: Very helpful and easy to work with! The staff (in particular the service department) made the car purchasing experience pleasant and enjoyable!

name: Aretha Johnson
text: I love this place. I live in Mississippi but travel to chatom for real, honest, dependable,service.

name: Marnicia Cathey
text: Not trustworthy!!!!!! I purchased a 2016 Mustang. On the way home,  water started filling up in the right headlight from the rain. I was never told about the faulty headlight that was trash. When I called the dealership, they did nothing!!! Big mistake dealing with these people!!!!!!!!

name: John Lott
text: In and out in record time! Drive over, chitchat, pre-approval, test drive and sign paperwork in less than 2 hrs driving home! Better than the 6hrs in Gulfport!  Way to go Cynthia, Kevin and Koby thank you!

name: Jared Lanier
text: Great customer service and outstanding selection! Highly recommend!

name: Candice Scott (candi cane)
text: Anthony the sells guy was great with us but Kolby is awesome we loved him  😁😁

text: Love this place.

resp.text: Yes we guarantee to giveaway a 50 inch tv, an iPad, and $100 cash every day of the sale. If you look on our Facebook page, you will see many pictures of many winners.

text: Friendly folks with lots of inventory to choose from.

text: mm

name: Robin Walker

resp.text: We have no record of you ever being a customer?

name: Nikki Levene
text: We shopped around to find a good deal on a safe, reliable vehicle for our teenage daughter, whose previous used car turned out to be a lemon. JC Wilson was amazing to deal with and was able to get us in the car she absolutely loves at a price we could afford. Joe Bullard really takes the time to find out your needs and goes above and beyond for their customers!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Genie Claiborne
text: Tori and Thomas were so helpful and made the process of buying my vehicle so easy and hassle free. All of the staff were very welcoming. I will purchase here again!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Johnny Moore
text: I had a great experience at Joe Bullard Cadillac. They met all of my needs in purchasing a car. They worked hard and answered all my questions. They made sure that my 2017 Nissan Maxima Platinum was up to their standards   before they would release it and that means a lot. Haley McGraw The internet sales manager did everything she could to make sure i was updated and informed on all aspects of the sale . She is top notch and very helpful. Alan Carlisle was also helpful and took great care of me. Ill definitely choose Joe Bullard when i purchase my next car. Thanks again to Haley,Alan and the whole Joe Bullard Cadillac team .

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Brittney E
text: I took my Escalade to the service dept to get work done on it. They miss diagnosed it and I paid over $500.00 for repair. I had my truck 2 days before it started doing the same thing again. I called to let them know and got the vehicle back over to them. They had my truck a little over a week and claim it was not doing anything for them and that it was old codes showing up. Well since I have had my vehicle back it once again started doing the same thing showing up the same codes. I decided to take it to another dealership and to my surprise the codes that they told me was old was not old they just cleared them instead of fixing my truck. I'm very upset because they repeatedly lied to me over and over. I will not recommend the service dept at all. They just played around with my truck and I called to let Myla know that it was doing the same thing again and that I took it to another dealership and they showed me how codes had been cleared and showed me the history codes. She stated Christian the service manager would call me but he never did.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am very sorry your experience wasn’t what you’d hoped. I have reached out to management to let them know about your recent experience. Someone will be in contact soon.

name: Angela Johnson
text: My car buying experience at Joe Bullard was awesome because of salesperson Rodney Lofton.  Rodney worked hard to locate the exact Cadillac that I requested.  He was also very professional, knowledgeable, courteous, and thoughtful. Furthermore, he even personally delivered my car to my home.  Before leaving me with my new car, he explained again how to use the features in the car.  In closing, it is obvious that Rodney enjoys selling cars and making his customers happy.

resp.text: Thank you for your rating! We hope to see you back soon. We appreciate your business and thank you for choosing to be a part of the Joe Bullard family of customers!

name: Carrie Wood
text: My car buying experience at Joe Bullard Cadillac was one of the fastest, most efficient buying processes I've ever experienced. Either way, they gave me a note of encouragement that every mom needs sometimes with a gift card for coffee. The second time: I requested a larger loaner vehicle which is apparently hard to come by. Along with my 3 kids, my dad is in a wheelchair and I transport him to/from dialysis and we just all wouldn't fit in the smaller one. They greeted me with a "one tough cookie" box with treats and snacks galore.

They are the nicest people and so accommodating. Add uplifting to that mix. That was this exhausted Mama's gift from heaven.

I can't say enough good things about them. I would buy every vehicle from them a thousand times over just to show my appreciation to their service department. Thanks guys!

name: Veronica Eaton
text: I was due for an oil change for my 2012 Cadillac SRX and received a call from the dealership asking me to schedule an appt. I looked online 1st to schedule, there was an appt. available for the next day. I didn't book it, thinking that maybe the person that called would get credit for service. I called her back, and was informed that it would be a week out for the oil change, fine. I also had a secondary issue of getting an estimate for the liftgate actuator replacement. A week later, I take the car in and wait on it. When it was done, I specifically asked about the actuator and was told that the estimate was the paperwork. It wasn't. I called back today to see when I could have this repaired and  was given another appt. a week out. The moral of the story is that they listed 12 things for "recommended services"  but nothing on what I actually requested. The car could have been repaired 10 days ago if I had been given the info that I requested. Now I'm trying to see if I can get my SRX repaired at another dealership either in Pensacola or Gulf Port.

resp.text: Hi Veronica,  I am very sorry to hear about your recent experiece with us. It is our goal to provide each customer with the best service experience possible. We have passed your feedback along to our General Manager and Serivice Manager. With your feedback we can only improve our processes and provide you with the best experience possible.

text: By far the absolute best experience I have ever had buying a car. If you are looking for a car please see Michael Sewell. Absolutely fantastic to deal with and I would highly recommend him! Once you walk in there is no doubt that customer satisfaction and the customers experience is higher in the business plan than the numbers are which is not normal operating procedure in most dealerships I could not write enough about how pleased I was with the whole experience. I did not walk out feeling as though a great deal on a vehicle was the only thing I got. I walked out of that dealership with an uplifted spirit and felt through the whole process that I was receiving amazing fellowship and as if I were being edified through this whole process. If God sees fit I will absolutely be a customer for life.They were an absolute inspiration and are a perfect model of a working business  plan that is extremely successful. And I’m not talking only monetarily successful. I left with a fire in me that they helped to burn brighter. And I thank them from the bottom of my heart for allowing God to work through them as they unknowingly ministered to me They never realized it and that’s what makes them special.

name: Douglas Allen
text: What started off as a beautiful experience has turned out to be a nightmare. I purchased what was told to me to be my Certified 2015 Chevrolet Suburban LTZ. Rodney Lofton who is a awesome salesman and Roseevelt Harris the phenomenal finance guy sold me the vehicle and 3mths into my purchased I was told I had over $2k worth of repairs including brakes, new radiator, tune-up, oil cooler lines, and left tie rod end just to name a few. When I asked why wasn't these things serviced and replaced before I purchased the vehicle I was told the repairs wasn't necessary at the time. I feel the salesman did a great job but the service department made it a bad purchase by not doing their job!! I had to pay for the replacement of the radiator and oil cooling lines but the other repairs are still needed. I feel robbed and will probably never purchase from a major dealership like Joe Bullard again!!

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Allen,

Thank you for taking the time to give us this feedback. To make sure this issue is addressed/resolved I have notified the General Manager, Jason Colbert, of the situation and asked that he reached out to you as soon as possible today.

I'm very sorry that your service experience did not mirror your sales experience at our store but I'm confident if there's a way to rectify the issue our team will do so.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M., Marketing Manager

name: Robert Werning
text:
Review of Joe Bullard dealership

My used car purchase was probably a little different than most.  In my case, I needed a good, reliable vehicle as quickly as possible and would immediately be making a 12 hour road trip to a different state as soon as the car was in my possession!  My salesman Curtis Williams showed me what I wanted to see, took the time to answer my questions, and gave me the time to decide if the car was right for me - no "pressure to buy" involved.

Curtis actually delivered the car personally the next day, so that I did not have make another 2 hour trip from Pensacola to Mobile and back to pick up the car!
Overall I would say that I am very satisfied with the service I received at this dealership.  If all their employees are as conscientious as the ones that I dealt with I would not hesitate to recommend this dealer.

Respect and kindness are almost a lost value in todays society, but to us they are still important, Troy exemplifies these and more in how he serves his customers,
We were  surprised to hear Christian music playing and to hear the testimonies of several of the staff. We thank them for their standing up for the American values and showing that they are truly a family doing business in an honorable way.
Troy, we have put you and your new Bride on our pray list and thank you for not making fun of us older folks that haven't embraced " this tech -infested" world  fully yet.
We will see you this coming week with more ? and to drop off the keys.

name: Willie Johnson
text:
I have purchase many vehicle and I must say that this was one of the most pleasant experiences I have encountered buying a vehicle.  From my internet inquiry I get a phone call from Ms. Ashley Allen, a very pleasant experience.  Ms. Allen set up an appointment for me to see the vehicle I was inquiring about with Mr. Ben Jackson.  From the moment I entered the doors I was greeted and treated as a lifelong customer.  After meeting with Mr. Jackson I was introduce to Mr. Curtis Williams who would be my salesman.

Mr. Williams and I sat down to discuss what I was looking for in the vehicle of my my choice.  Once I had selected the vehicle, Mr. Williams made the test drive a pleasant and unique experience.  After I decided that this was the vehicle that i wanted, he even saw to it that the reasonable minor imperfections that I nit-picked while looking over the vehicle were taken care of prior to my picking up the vehicle.  Negotiating the final price was even an enjoyable experience, which is rare.  I think that at the end of the day we were both happy with the price.  At no time during the experience did I feel pressured or uneasy.

I will highly recommend to anyone that is looking to purchase a new or used vehicle, visit Joe Bullock Cadillac and ask for Mr. Curtis Williams.

Willie Johnson

name: Matt Holloway
text: Terrible! I came in because I had a tail light out and it's one of the newer LED lights that aren't supposed to burn out. They told me to come in at 3 and I would be out by 4. At 4 they had just finished their diagnostic check and they told me it would cost $607 to replace my tail light. I told them to go ahead even though I believed it was too pricey. The rep told me the light costs $500+ and the labor wasnt that much. I started to look up the part online brand new and I could buy 2 for less than what he quoted me. I told him they could stop and I'll bring in the light myself after buying it cheaper elsewhere. He tells me I will still have to pay $135 for the diagnostic. No problem. He comes back and tells me it's already in. I ask well where is my car? He says they're finishing up. 45 minutes later he comes back and tells me that they put a new light in and it didnt work. Must be a wiring issue he said. So I said: "So that $135 diagnostic u tried to charge me for wasn't even accurate? Because the diagnostic claimed I needed a new light." He never did answer. They did change my oil so I paid for my oil change only and went to leave. When I got my car back if was filthy even though they claimed all customers get a complimentary wash with all services. I will never go there again.

resp.text:
Hi Matt,

Thank you for providing us with this valuable feedback. I assure you this is not the Bullard experience we want for our clients.

I have forwarded your comments to the Service Manager, Sean Alexander, as well as the General Manager so that this can be addressed. I’ve also asked for one of them
to contact you to personally discuss in more detail.

I’m sincerely sorry for how your visit with us needed and I hope that we will be able to earn back your business.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.

name: Julie A
text:
Our family was on vacation in Mobile Alabama this past week. Things didn't go quite as we had planned. Our SUV was cutting out pretty bad on the highway. It was getting worse the closer we got to Mobile. I contacted my friend who's daughter lives in Mobile to see if she might know of a service place. I talked with her daughter and she informed me that her husband, Kyle, worked for Joe Bullard Cadillac. She gave me the number for the service department and said to speak with Haley.  About this time the check engine light came on in our vehicle. It was flashing on and off, then would stay lit.
When I spoke with Haley in the service department she asked about the service engine light. When I told her it had been flashing intermittently she was immediately concerned and said we should get stopped as quickly as we could to avoid internal engine damage.  She then helped us get started with finding a tow service. We were 50 miles aWay and had four people so their usual towing service couldn't do it, but she got the ball rolling for us. She gave me her direct phone number so I could call if I needed anything.
Once we got to the dealership Kyle helped us get a loaner car while ours was being repaired. Haley kept us informed as they learned what was wrong. Our technician, Mike, came in on Saturday to work on our vehicle because we needed to leave to head back to Missouri on Sunday.
To make a long story short...God used all of these people to help us during a difficult time. They made this experience so much less stressful than it could've been. THEY WENT ABOVE AND BEYOND TO HELP US! And, they did it all with a smile. We appreciate the dealership and all the individuals who helped get us back on the road. I would recommend them to anyone who needs service or a new ride!!!

resp.text:
Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We always strive to meet the needs of our customers no matter the situation. Feel free to let us know if you have any concerns about your vehicle.

Kind regards,
Robby Herbert, GM, rherbert@joebullard.com (251)-544-7341

name: Jami Morgan
text: The people in the service department handling my claim were very nice. What I didn't like was that the mechanics were excessively rough with my vehicle. I had to have it towed and the towing company left it at the gate. Christian got me a loaner car, which I appreciated very much. When I picked up the loaner there were 2 guys who were trying to get it started to get it up to the shop. I needed to grab a couple things out of my car so I stopped to do that. For some reason they needed to open the back hatch. I was traveling with my animals so I had a large kennel in the back. I watched them put my seats down (rather roughly) and sling my kennel from the back to atop the back seats. It made me cringe but at this point I needed to get going as I had some stops to make and  I thought surely they knew what they were doing, this is a Cadillac dealership afterall and these cars cost a lot. They will surely be careful... When I got my car back, instead of them putting the vehicle back they way they found it, the kennel was still strown across the back. (As a plus though, it was washed! Which I appreciated since I had been on the road and try to take care of my car!) When I went to move the kennel back in place I noticed that there are scrapes across the plastic sides in the back. Greeeeaaaaaat. But, at that point I was leaving to head back to my home state and couldn't worry about it. It was more important to get home safe. They told me in addition to the battery that I needed new air filters, a rear wiper blade, and the throttle body cleaned, all easy enough for me to do myself. So, now I am here doing said maintenance and when I popped the hood I immediately noticed that my positive battery terminal clip has been broken and won't stay shut. Great. I am now back home, 3 states away. I will be back to the area, and am considering moving my family there but if they don't make this right I will find a different dealership to maintenance at.

resp.text:
Hi Jami,

Thank you for taking the time to leave your review and detailed feedback. We are closed today; however, I’m sending your comments over to my General Manager and Service Manager to make sure they address this first thing in the morning. Please expect a call from us tomorrow. I’m very sorry for your experience and I hope we have the opportunity to prove to you this is not how do business nor is this how we want our customers to feel when they leave our dealership.

Sincerely,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

She sent me to my saleslady Courtney Mauldin, asks for her when you come in, she was totally Awesome. She went above and beyond to get a deal worked out for me,  there was an issue with the car and she took it straight to  service and they fixed it right away and found something else and ordered the part and sent it to detail to get it clean up and they did a great job. If you are looking to purchase a vehicle I recommend Joe Bullard Cadillac, who will treat you right, quick in and out, and they are Veteran friendly, great staff and service. It was worth the 285 miles that I drove from Louisiana to get an awesome deal and meet some great people that really cared about my shopping experience. name: Bill McLarty
text: I am William, answering for my wife Cheryl.  We bought this car new in 2004.  It has been solely serviced and maintained by McConnel/Bullard.  It has less than 30,000 miles on the odometer.  It's been the worst car we've owned since our marriage in 1962.  The problem today was a broken window regulator on the rear driver's side.  My wife has been the sole driver of this car.  We have no children in then home.  My conservative guess is that this window has been lowered and raised no more than 10 times in its aborted lifetime.  My wife was told a plastic roller had broken.  A plastic roller in a $50,000 (2004) Cadillac?!  My bill:  $517.23!  I can go back through my invoices and find similar instances of shoddy work and padded bills.  During the second year we owned the car the driver side dash assembly fell off the dash while my wife was driving.  At around the 4-5 year of ownership your service supervisor convinced my wife that she needed to replace all four tires (around 10,000 miles) because they had "dry-rotted." ($800)  I've owned two Cadillac De Ville's prior to this, and have never experienced what has to be either poor construction, low-quality parts, or untruthful service managers.

text: Absolutely, the most wonderful buying experience my wife Kathy and I have ever had.  The atmosphere was amazing!!  Ty was very gracious and made us feel so welcome as did the entire Bullard family!! Andrew Speight was phenomenal with his delightful British accent describing all of the wonderful details of this truly great Cadillac DTS. His knowledge of the vehicle was paramount!! He knew 'everything' and treated us royally with the test driving and description of the many facets of the vehicle. Andrew kept everything in perspective of the price we could afford. Then he turned us over to Jon McCarthy who was equally as brilliant. Jon made it happen!!! What service!! Jon was so relatable with such tenacity in helping us, and he really came through with making our dream come true!! We highly recommend the family of Joe Bullard Cadillac, and especially Andrew Speight and Jon McCarthy.  They will indeed spoil you! We really thank the Lord for sending us to this Company, thy are a true blessing to the gulf coast!!

name: C C Hall
text: I purchased a Cadillac SRX on 1/11/14 from Joe Bullard Cadillac. Curtis, Roosevelt and Ty were very courteous to me and my husband. They answered all of my questions and worked with us to get to the price we were willing to pay. The Cadillac warranty is hard to beat, especially the 4 years of maintenance and the road side assistance. This is the 6th GM vehicle that we presently own and I know will be the best serviced one by far. I had been looking for a vehicle for 5 months when I decided to look at the SRX. I am glad I did. It has everything on it that I was looking for plus a lot or more features. Everyone at the dealership that walked by you spoke and asked you how you were doing. This is a dream vehicle for me and I look forward to driving it for years. I will recommend to family and friends that are interested in a great luxury car or SUV to get a Cadillac at Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, Alabama and ask for Curtis. I had to use the service department today to get my oil changed and check the routine things out. Christian and the others were very courteous and took care of me and my SRX. The customer lounge area was very pleasant and comfortable during my wait.

name: Greg Loughlin
text: Good workmanship, poor communication.  No warranty info with tires on road hazzard option.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Loughlin,

Thank you for giving us this valuable feedback. I have sent your comments to our Parts and Service Manager as well as the General Manager for them to consider how we can better improve our communication and process. Please feel free to contact us any time you need assistance and we hope to continue working with you in the future.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Ashley Brown
text:
Superior Service A++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

My experience at Joe Bullard Cadillac - Mobile Alabama was excellent to say the least. The moment my fiance and I pulled up to the dealership we felt welcome. Mustafa Elastal immediately greeted us and made us feel important. He went out of his way to make us feel comfortable as he walked around the lot with us picking out suitable vehicles. This was very important to me considering I had never owned a Cadillac before. His extensive knowledge of the vehicle I wanted (XTS) and the history of Cadillac itself impressed me by far. The hospitality didn't stop with Mustafa. Roosevelt Harris also did a fine job answering all the questions I had about the different cars and prices. He also mentioned a couple of nice restaurants we could try out while visiting Atlanta, GA which we did and absolutely loved. Curtis Williams came by and personally greeted us and also had a nice conversation with my fiance. Last, but definitely not least, Jon McCartney was absolutely amazing (and not just because he actually knows where Winnfield, LA is located lol). He worked very hard to get the financing I needed to get the exact vehicle I wanted. It was a hard sale for me, but he showed us that he wouldn't give up. I really appreciated all the time that each of them took out to make our experience the best car buying experience we have had. I would recommend this dealership without thinking twice (I already have mentioned them to others), and I will be bringing others to come do business with Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, AL.

name: Ramona Reed
text: Honestly we did not wake up that morning thinking of buying a car. We saw one on the interstate and decided to go look at them. When we got there it was freezing and windy and Darren Robinson was in the parking lot moving cars. He offered his help and we told him we were in town to Christmas shop not spend all day at a dealership, we just wanted to try the car on for size. he escorted us inside for coffee and cocoa and went to get the car. we test drove it. we loved it but we were not there to spend all day at the dealership. we left our personal information to be reviewed and were going to shop when Darren notified us that we would be using the cadillac for the day via loaner form approval. we really enjoyed using the car. we Christmas shopped all day and when we returned to the dealership we had been approved for the car with our payments within dollars of request. Jon McCartney had to have been the most professional financial manager i have ever encountered. He was a real person who made us feel right at home and comfortable to speak openly. very friendly and personable. then Roosevelt Harris enters the picture. a gem. a diamond in the rough. so charismatic so joyful and helpful and accomodating. I cannot put into words how much Darren helped to familiarize us with the cue and features. he was so knowledgable of the cars systems. he was an absolute treasure. I cant say but one thing about Joe Bullards team, "you are doing something right". I got hugs from everyone when i left. i felt like i was part of a family there. I even got a text message from Darren on Christmas morning wishing us a merry Christmas. i literally spent 2 hrs tops at the dealership and received the most beautiful CHristmas gift I could have ever dreamed of. but the most inportant thing was the environment and kindness that we experienced while there. oh and my son loved the lounge with computers and coffee/cocoa which made his time there enjoyable also. we will definitely reccomend Joe Bullard Cadillac to friends and family and we will definitely be repeat customers ourselves. my only hope is that we have the privilege of having the same staff in years to come. Thank you so very much.

name: Fred King
text:
From the moment I walked in the front door, Andrew, Ben, and Ty did their best to find the perfect car for us. They were more than successful, my wife and I both have never been more satisfied with a major purchase and the reason for this was the genuine effort each member of the team at Joe Bullard put forth to ensure that we left not only as satisified customers, but as new friends.

Andrew stayed with us and walked us through the process and was a very genuine and honest regarding the steps and what was happenning and what was going to happen.

Ben was very diligent and went above and beyond to get the exact car we were looking for... the car is perfect, just what we wanted.

Ty was also great, taking time to sit and talk to us about what was happenning and to ensure us that everything was on track and going well. It was and it did. I do not remember seeing as big a smile as when I told my wife that ya'll had her car ready... Thanks

Richard made the paperwork fly by with ease... the power of a sharpie to show me where to sign... Thanks for making the experience great.

I can not say enough about my outstanding visit and purchase, when you want to go back to the dealership that sold you a car to visit with  the people who were involved in getting you a vehicle because they are now friends, I guess that is how it is always suppossed to work, I am glad that I found the place to go and to send my friends and family to when we need not only a new vehicle, but to meet some outstanding people as well.

Thanks again!

Fred & Diane

name: Andrea La Rossa
text: Wow!  Another great experience with Joe Bullard Automotive!  My Salesman, Damos Brand, was wonderful. He was courteous, professional, and very knowledgeable about the Cadillac product line and that helped make my car buying experience a dream!  Damos delivered my new Cadillac XTS to me and then spent as much time as I needed going over all of the XTS functions and assisted in setting up my XTS to suit me perfectly!!  I love my new Cadillac XTS and once again, I will recommend Joe Bullard Cadillac, Damos Brand, and the New Car Sales Manager, Roosevelt Harris, Jr., to everyone I can.  Both of these men are true assets to Joe Bullard Automotive.

name: Jim Smith
text:
I was impressed from the start with Rich Borden who was the first person I met and provided me an excellent selection of new and used models to make my choice. I had driven a 2002 Cadillac Deville for 10 years, so I was already happy with the Cadillac family and had owned/driven GM (Pontiacs before the Deville)cars since 1966. Because I perferred new over used, and because I had never leased a vehicle, Rich introduced me to Ben Jackson who provided me the pros and cons of the lease vs purchase option. I made my decision on a 3 year lease. I made my choice of the 2013 XTS.
The administrative process was made flawless by the excellent knowledge and professionalism of Ben Jackson and Richard Nassar.
The entire sales staff from Ty Bullard(same as when I bought a new Olsmobile Holiday 88 from his Dad and Granddad Joe Bullard in 1978), Roosevelt Harris(who presented me my Cadillac IPad),and in particular Rich Borden was outstanding.

name: chris edmunds
text: When I tell you that my salesman, Mr.Curtis Williams and my fiancé Officer Mr. Roosevelt Harris did such a out standing job. Can't get any better!

text: Didn’t take a super long time. Was in and out in about 3 hours. Made the experience really fun and inclusive. Approved me for the wrong car but I love the car any ways and they have a beautiful selection of cars to choose from. Simply a decent car buying experience from a lovely team

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review, Shania. Our team at Jim Burke Hyundai always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Until next time, take care.

name: Stephanie Sloan
text: I assume everything was done correctly, oil change and tire rotation. I arrived at 3:06 for my 3:00 appointment. ( I did say I would be there by 3:15 when I scheduled). It was 5:04 when I left. That was a long time to service my vehicle, especially when having an appointment.

name: Jack Norris
text:
This was honestly the best experience I have had with a dealership.
First, like most dealerships you get a warm greeting and all the pleasantries of being a potential buyer. This is where my experience usually changes. Usually after the salesperson talks to me, and I tell them my wants then start the negotiations it all changes. This did not happen at all. The sales people Adrienne and Chris were friendly and helpful. They seemed to genuinely care. The financial personal Timberley was very warm and tried to relate to my country roots. There was another lady there that helped me and got the car I wanted and worked out the financial part. I unfortunately forgot her name. She was awesome as well and got me exactly what I wanted!

Thank you all and please keep up the great work!

name: Erica Bass
text: Wonderful love the sale man. He was very helpful. Nathan Merchant a around applause to you, And thank you for help my family in these difficult times.

name: Chandra Sekar
text: Do not recommend this place. The wait time is much longer than what was communicated initially and there isn't a proper documentation of the services performed. I  was charged for a tire rotation and this wasn't check marked on the completed services sheet. The response from the service staff was "the technician has done it but doesn't know why it's not check marked as completed". Doesn't provide me confidence to believe if any of the other services was even done.

resp.text: Hi Chandra, Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (205) 324-3371 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

name: carole strong
text: Typically I get good service from Jim Burke but not this time. They made promises they didn’t keep and the service took much longer than they initially told me. Was without a car for two days. Said they would have the part overnighted however it didn’t show up until the second day.

name: Micah Shields
text: Great service! Brian was helpful with getting my car’s routine maintenance back on track and making sure that everything in my car was functioning properly.

name: Gary Schneider
text:
Wonderful personalized service received on Saturday, May 29th.
Broke down on highway on Friday night. Spoke with A J Allen in the service department and was told if I got the car there early on Saturday they would do everything possible to get me back on the road to Texas. A J was there on Saturday morning and was able to diagnose and fix the issue. He kept me updated throughout the morning and had me back up and running by 11:00.

name: Christelle Williams
text: Thanks to the People At Jimburke and Most definitely a HUGE THANKS TO The Hyundai Manager and Team For helping me Get in my First car ❤️ You should definitely stop here before losing hope, They help any situation.

resp.text: Hi Christelle, Thanks so much for taking the time to share your feedback! We're happy to hear that you had a great experience with us at Jim Burke Hyundai and hope to see you again take care!

name: Renee Page-Nash
text:
The service staff are excellent.  I am disappointed with the suggested maintenance packages which are exorbitant.  They should just stick with the  owners manual maintenance schedule.

6/22 No one can tell me why my car is burning oil or why the oil light didn't come on when the oil was low.  This is concerning.

resp.text:
Renee,
Thank you so much for your review of Jim Burke Hyundai! We truly appreciate the feedback and hope to hear from you again.

name: Carey Culpepper
text: Very couteous and were willing to haggle.The new car clean-up dept needs a higher standard.

text: It's located at the center of Birmingham city, where easy to access. They understand what the problem of your car and what to do to improve the condition regular basis. Their service reservation website is convenient keeping record.

resp.text: Hey there, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Michelle Patterson
text: They listen and I just love their service

name: Sharon Burtnett
text:
My Husband and I bought our first Hyundai (Sonata) at Jim Burke in 2010. We are still enjoying this car and the sales experience was GREAT and we recommended them to friends and family.

In 2017 we bought a new Accent. Again everything was Great and we shared this experience as well.We returned  in 2018 ams bought an Elantra. The Elantra recently broke
down.  Out of warranty of course. We had it towed to Jim Burke  and we received a call that my car needed  an engine. The cost of $7500.00.I thought since we bought 3 new cars that maybe we could get a deal on this service.INSTEAD we were told there was a $150.00 for checking the car out. This was not diacussed when we called and dropped the car off. Nothing like being kicked while you are down. I did some research and found there have been problems with the Engines in the ElantrI am verys sossapointes with the company I thought was so HRgreat and can no longer recxpmend the company and I will also tell anyone that will losten about thisbjorrivlw expeI qill tell anyone who qill liisten about this horrible experience!

My typing is not so grear because of broken hand and arm.

resp.text: Hey there, Tre, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

text: I recently had to replace my windshield and I am so please with the service at Jim Burke. The technician did excellent work and also changed my oil without me even asking. The service at this location is always great and I'll remain a loyal customer.

name: Robert Cato
text: great friendly service!! Jordan smith and Toni vines both worked with me through 3 visits. They both took time and patience working with me and getting me the best deal for what I had to offer.. I highly recommend both of these salesmen if you go to Jim Burke used car lot in north Birmingham. I was also checked up on and greeted by several other employees through out the visits. Overall great experience!!

resp.text: Hey Kleindienst, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

text: Always get things in writing with Jim Burke..turnover rate is ridiculous. You never know who you are speaking with. Sales person and manager who made "Promises of detailing my vehicle when purchased and reimbursement to the hyundai customer who recommended me, were all lies..when I called to follow up there were no longer there. The new manager had no clue and lied to me as well. I called to follow up..he was no longer there. Poor service, inaccurate quotes, and nothing but lip service given (telling me what they thought I needed to hear).

text: Our experience with Jim Burke Hyundai was a very positive and pleasant one. Our sales representative, Larry Greenhill, went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied with our purchase. His efforts were not in vain. I am very pleased with my 2020 Tucson Sport.

name: Frankie Washington
text: The whole team was wonderful but special mention for my salesman Antonio Gillespie and the Finance manager Melvin. Speedy and professional service with a smile and no games. Everyone was so friendly!! Got a wonderful deal and reasonable monthly payments!!! I recommend them highly!!!

name: Sandy Stern
text: Time expected to be finished was what they told me. Unfortunately,they could not complete all the repairs today. I really think that they needed to wait until they could repair all things at the same time.

Patrick,
Thank you for reviewing your service experience! We aim to provide time-efficient and exceptional service for our guests, and we are proud that this was received during your time spent with us.

name: Essie Johnson
text: I can honestly say my experience was great! My salesman, Dennis Johnson was absolutely AMAZING! He is very knowledgeable, courteous,  attentive, patient, honest. If you are looking for a car without all the hassle, Jim Burke Hyundai is where you want go. The staff is great.  Great deals, great cars, great people!  They really care!  I am a customer for life!

name: Alexus Carter
text: I had a great experience at this dealership, everyone was really friendly and willing to help. The best thing was I drove away in a new car! Big thanks to everyone who helped! I definitely recommend!

name: Paul Berman
text: Jordan Cook continuously goes out of his way to ensure that my service visits are done quickly, in the most cost efficient manner.   Servicing my car can be a challenge as I am currently traveling outside of AL weeks at a time.  Whenever its time for the vehicle's next servicing, help is only a p[hone call away.  Jordan demonstrates unwavering attention to details and customer service, which is why I bring my 2016 Hyundai Sonata Sport to Jordan in Birmingham versus having it serviced in Atlanta or other possible locations.  Why?  Because in my opinion, he cares about his customers and their satisfaction with Jim Burke's service and his own professional service as well.  Thank you Jordan for all you do!

name: Angela Brown
text: I purchased a new Sonata and everyone at Jim Burke was so helpful & nice. My salesperson Alexis was so knowledgeably and was not pushy at all. text: Always outstanding service!  Jordan and everyone on the service  team is always very helpful and believe in making sure you're a satisfied customer!

name: Melissa Mynatt
text: The service center was excellent. From the time i got there until I had left the customer service was one of the best i had visited to date.  The only complaint i had was grease was left on my driver seat and on the driver door liner.  I wished the mechanic had paid as much attention as the service center or possibly protected the seat.

name: Bryanna McClain
text: The associates at Jim Burke Hyundai all were welcoming and kind. In particular I would like to acknowledge my dealer Andrew Briggins who made sure I was comfortable and that I got what I wanted. He was very thorough and very knowledgeable about the inventory at hand and unknowingly persuasive when introducing me to the 2020 Hyundai Sonata SEL. I absolutely love my car and I am proud of my choice. Thank you Andrew and Jim Burke Hyundai for my sweet sweet ride!

name: Susan Crow
text: I have had a great experience with Eddie Hicks as my service advisor.  I always feel like I am being dealt with honestly.

name: Bama Born & Bred
text: I went to Jim Burke Hyundai recently and received excellent service. The service technician was very nice and polite. He advised me of a recall that was on my car and explained what it was for and how they would fix it.  I got three services for my car(which included the recall) and was out in 1 hour. I didn’t even have an appointment!!! The customer waiting area was comfortable and check out was easy and quick.  I would highly recommend the service department to anyone needing great work on their automobile and good customer service.

name: Jon Tanja
text: I was satisfied

name: Ayesha Aj
text: Jessie was the best car salesman I have ever encountered. Adrienne was not my salesperson but she was very hospitable, friendly and thorough! I would definitely recommend either of them to anyone needing a vehicle !!

name: Tae Alexander
text: Purchased a 2020 Hyundai Santa Fe’ through Brandon Blagg. He was excellent from the beginning to the end. He made the process easy. He explained and demonstrated things to us in a way that most others might have not. Although the sale was important, to him he showed just as much concern about driving away in something that we wouldn’t regret. The atmosphere was nice and welcoming. Not boring at all. The staff was friendly too.  In the end Brandon wouldn’t stop until the last tire received its shine. Thanks a bunch!

name: Monica Leach
text: I am enjoying my little gas saver.

name: Brittany Card
text: Took my car in for a check engine light that was on for a month. The light was off by the time I took it in of course but Jim Burke found the problem and fixed it. Location is so close and convenient to my job so made it easy to drop off and pick up. Will definitely be going to them again for any service for my car! They were fantastic!

name: Dayatra Laster
text: Service writer recommended I get a transmission flush on 2/17/20. I had a transmission flush done on 1/27/20. Same auto shop same service writer.

text:
I had a very wonderful experience at the  Hyundai service department.  Eddie Hicks, the service representative was very knowledgeable and helpful during my visit. Questions were answered without hesitation and he didn’t try to rush me off. Eddie was also helpful getting me an Uber to my friends house . After getting to my friends house and getting a bite to eat my car was ready to be picked up. Fast service. Thanks again for taking care of my car. I will be back for an oil change in a few months.
Alexis Morton

text: The staff were wonderful and extremely professional.  They updated me when needed, took time to explain the automotive issue and the repair used to update the vehicle. I’ve been highly impressed by the service provided and I will definitely return .

text: My experience from the start was very respectful treatment from all the team at Jim Burke specially from Clearance thanks to all you guys and for the cups of coffee during the deal thanks to be so kind with me even when my English it was not perfect you deal with and gave me a good attention to all my request God Bless You All Guys and thank you Kendra for your help and beautiful Smile all the time

text: Even though I didn't get my car there, they were very accommodating.

resp.text: Andrew, We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We look forward to seeing you again soon at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Holly Davis
text: Completely satisfied!  I would 100% buy another car from Jim Burke.  Their selection is great and the Sales and Finance teams were excellent to work with.  They were understanding and able to work with our situation and got us exactly what we wanted.

name: Berdell White
text: I was very pleased with the service that I received from everyone at Jim Burke's All my questions were answered promptly!  I'm enjoying my new 2020 Hyundai Palisade! I love it!

name: Peter Newman
text: Good workmanship but the place is rather crowded and hectic.  They need more space and the ability to put fine touches like cleaning to a job after completion considering the quotes are a bit pricey.

name: Sandra D Kindell
text:
The service associates are always professional and courteous.  They advise on service needed to your car, giving details of the service and the expected cost. The cost factor is important, because  quite frankly, money doesn't grow on trees.  They  also give you an estimation on the length of time involved in completing the setvice.  Most of them remember you if you have had repeat business with Jim Burke.

The cashier at the Hyundai service area is always very friendly and helpful.  She is an asset to the department.

name: mycal garrett
text: I just purchased a car from Hyundai and i had the best experience I've had in a long time. My sales rep was Ashley and she is a very polite and respectful salesman. She helped me with everything that i needed and then some. Very knowledgeable about the product and very informative as well. Probably one of the best sales reps I've had the pleasure of dealing with. If you are interested in buying a Hyundai from Jim Burke. Ask for Ashley she wont disappoint.

name: Sherry Lacey
text: Chris Thomas and the finance manager were great! I know God sent them to me. They are the best! Thank you!

name: Steven Gross
text: My experience with Jim Burke Body Shop was a pleasant one - from the initial phone call, through the claim/repair process, and finally to pick-up. At the front desk, Ashley handled my reception with the utmost courtesy and customer service. Josh, the assistant manager was equally professional and the one who handled my claim and kept me up to date on the status and dealt with the insurance company on my behalf. Finally, on pick-up, I found my car waiting for me, freshly cleaned - inside and out. The body shop is a Hyundai preferred repair center and I would recommend them to my fellow Hyundai drivers.

name: Myra Reed
text: I was thrilled with the short wait time. I always ask for Eddie and once again he provided superior customer service. As an example, it was raining and he pulled my car inside so I wouldn’t get wet when leaving. Super great guy!!

text: Had a really good experience.  My sales rep Brian Christopher was very helpful without being pushy.  He listened to what I wanted and did everything to make sure I was satisfied.  The entire experience was very pleasant.  After the sale was completed he sat in the car with me to go over everything and told me if I had any questions to give him a call and he would be more than happy to help.  By the time I left I thought of him as a friend and not just a sales rep.  I was very impressed with the lease experience.  Had never done this before but it was not at all scary or stressful.  I have always had a high opinion of the dealership and this has confirmed my opinion.  Love the car and expect to be doing business with this rep and dealership for a long time.

text: Brian Christopher is absolutely fantastic to deal with.  His outstanding attitude and extensive knowledge of the vehicles makes every car buying experience a great one. I knew I wanted a Hyundai dealer to replace the tire.We found a gas station, then found this dealer right around the corner! The service department was incredibly nice and squeezed us into their busy day.  We were back on the road in no time! Thankyou, Thankyou, Thankyou, Jim Burke Hyundai! I love my local Hyundai dealer (shout out to Hyundai of Metairie!) but this one is fabulous too!!!

name: Tebriel Alexander
text:
I went to test drive a Hyundai Santa Fe'  two days ago. This is not my first Hyundai since reinventing itself and blowing our minds. Needless to say I purchased what is now my 5th Hyundai.  However, i'm here to brag on the man who walked my husband and I through this entire process in this humid Alabama weather.  Initially, I came in to take advantage of the $50 GIFT CARD that Hyundai was offering for simply test driving its vehicles, but I also knew that I would potentially be driving off the lot with something new as well. Brandon Blagg was awesome from the gate. He stood and walked over to me, invited me to his desk, and inquired concerning my business. A few questions later, a copy of my license, and "BAM" we were test driving a base model Santa Fe.' One would think that this guy designed these vehicle with his level of knowledge concerning them. Recalling that I have own several vehicles in my lifetime, it is feasible to understand that we have dealt with our share of sales consultants. This is by far the first person who not only informed us of what we would potentially enjoy about the vehicle, but patiently explained in detail its benefits, and demonstrated  to us its functionality. He took a base model vehicle and literally painted a picture that lifted it beyond it's level. He hung out with us for over an hour doing comparisons and contrasts. He was honest concerning pro and cons, but never negative.. not one time. For him every vehicle had its benefits, and for every person there was vehicle that fit them. THIS IS WHAT HE DID! He didn't interfere with our choice, but he made sure that we would be satisfied once we left  the lot for good. In the end we ended up purchasing a Santa Fe' SEL 2.4 engine with both the Convenience and Premium Package. He didn't use a hustler tactic to cause us to go for a higher grade, it was simply his transparency and patience that ultimately led to our selection. Recalling that this was in 90 + degree weather, this man didn't stop until the tires shined.  He made me laugh, shared stories, explained who was whom of the CEO vs. COO, and also wasn't shy around me whatsoever. He even blew bubble gum bubbles for our delightful 6 year old who stood amazed at the excellence his gum blowing abilities. Brandon Blagg, job well done. You deserve all that's coming for your hard work and dedication to service. Aside from our direct experience with Brandon, everyone rocked. Their pleasantness was superb, two of the women conversed with me, they offered treats to my babies, and others smiled and waved. There wasn't a rude attitude in the building. The lobby and bathrooms are well designed and clean. As lengthly a process that car buying could be, they have enough going for themselves to make you relax and enjoy your time.

Thanks Again, Tae A.

name: Agee Richardson
text: I can't say enough about the awesome staff in the Jim Burke Hyundai Service Department. Rusty, the Hyundai Service Department manager, has been very attentive to my automotive needs. When there was a way to hold the manufacturer's accountable for repairs associated with their recall, this service manager had no problem going to bat for me. Although my first impression of this establishment was not a good one due to lack of communication, my final impression is the one that REALLY COUNTS! I feel so blessed that these were the guys: Rusty, Eddie and Justin that tended to my 2013 Hyundai Sonata and me when my car just STOPPED RUNNING on the interstate. It took about a month to get my car fixed right, but they have stuck it out. I am proud to say that my blue-silver streak and I are on the road again tearing up the highway!!! Adrienne Richardson from Birmingham is your #1 Fan!!!
